description.value: Pre-defined validation acceptance criteria were established based on manufacturing development data derived from process characterization studies...

valueString.value: 1) Clear glass vial sealed with a gray rubber stopper and a flip off overseal 2) No visible damage or breach of vial container or closure
White to off white cake or powder, essentially free from evidence of contamination with no visible foreign particulates
Clear, colorless to slightly yellow solution, essentially free of visible particulates
Consistent with the retention time and UV spectrum of the reference standard
